file-save-hook.command: python3 -c "import json, sys, os; file_path = sys.argv[1]; ext = os.path.splitext(file_path)[1]; [json.dump(json.load(open(file_path)), open(file_path, 'w'), indent=4) if ext in ['.json'] else None, print(f'Reformatted {file_path} with 4-space indentation') if ext in ['.json'] else None]"
file-save-hook.description: Auto-format JSON files with 4-space indentation on save
